testcase.name: User is able to create Todo and the Todos are listed as items
testcase.system-out: Given User is on Todos management screen....................................passed When User creates the Todos and hit the Enter button........................passed Then Created Todos are listed as items in the same screen...................passed

testcase.name: User is able to Remove the Completed Todos
testcase.system-out: Given User is on Todos management screen to Remove the Todos................passed When User creates the Todos and Change the status of Todos to completed and Clear the Completed Todos.passed Then Completed and clear Todos are removed from the list....................passed

testcase.classname: Validate the items left for each status
testcase.name: Verify the numbers of items displayed is same for all Todo views
testcase.system-out: Given User is on Todos management screen to verify number of items value....passed When User creates the Todos and hit the Enter button and change the 1st Todo to completed and Click on all views and compare the items left value.passed Then items left value is based on the remaining Active Todos for all views..passed

testcase.classname: View the Todos that are active
testcase.name: User is able to view the Active Todos
testcase.system-out: Given User is on Todos management screen to view active.....................passed When User creates the Todos and hit the Enter button and change the 1st Todo to completed and Click on Active button.passed Then Active Todos are only listed in Todos list.............................passed

testcase.name: User is able to view the All Todos
testcase.system-out: Given User is on Todos management screen to view all........................passed When User creates the Todos and hit the Enter button and change the 1st Todo to completed.passed Then Completed Todos are listed as green tick items and others without a tick mar in the Todos list.passed

testcase.name: User is able to view the Completed Todos
testcase.system-out: Given User is on Todos management screen to view completed..................passed When User creates the Todos and hit the Enter button and change the status of Todos to completed and Click on Completed button.passed Then Completed Todos are listed as green tick items in the Todos list.......passed
